channel.title: Need help changing price and making thiefing ares
channel.description: okay i want to make the price for a party hat 200m. and i want to create objects on the map to work what file can i do that in i have the MoparScape server files.

item.title: Need help changing price and making thiefing ares
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

In addition to all that, check your shop buying/selling method, as there may be some algebra to your values. Mine’s simply whatever’s there is there, so I lucked out.

For the other question, I would first try your client.java, looking for something like ‘makeGlobalObject’ or ‘AddaObject’ or something along those lines.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing price and making thiefing ares

item.title: Need help changing price and making thiefing ares
item.dc:creator: @my_stoof my stoof
item.description:
@my_stoof wrote:

no its in item.cfg the first 3 numbers of the item beside of the name is the shop price, low alch price and high alch price. And the rest of the numbers beside is the item stats[quote=“sexy slay, post:2, topic:274943”]check under shops.cfg and look for the item id. One of the following numbers is amount in store, and price i belive. ( I havent coded 317’s in awhile so if my wrong then sorry)[/quote]

Read full topic
